text:
@SenMcSallyAZ @realDonaldTrump @RepDLesko @RepGosar Wonder if they have their wills created and in order. 
When this Covid-19 hits, it can and does at times sneak up and strike one dead on the ground they were standing. Just happened to a friend—was sickish, then boom! Lights out on the street.
